body: A password reset message has been sent to your registered email address
Another user has already registered an account with that email address. Please enter a different one.
Another user has already registered an account with that Username. Please select a different one.

Your password did not meet our complexity requirements. Please enter a new one that contains at least one capital letter, one lower case letter, one number, one special character, and is at least 8 characters long.
Your account has been registered, please check your email address for a confirmation link.
Thank you for confirming your account, you have been logged in and may begin using the site.
Your email address has been updated.
The password you entered does not match your old password, please try again.
The user's email address is now confirmed.
The user's account has been enabled.
The user's account has been disabled.
You have entered an invalid username or password.
No account with that username exists.
The confirmation token you provided is invalid. Re-check the email you received and try entering the link again, ensuring every character is copied to your browser.
